name: ts-library-boilerplate
description: A simple tree-shakable typeScript library boilerplate

scripts.test: nyc --include lib/**/*.ts --extension .ts --require ts-node/register mocha test/**/*.spec.ts && shx rm -rf ./.nyc_output && shx rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig-esm.json && rollup -c rollup.config.js dist/ts-library-boilerplate.js > dist/ts-library-boilerplate.bundle.js && cp package.json dist && ts-node tools/cleanup.ts && cp README.md dist
